# Parenteser

## Regel
$$
a(b+c) = ab + ac
$$

## Eksempler
$$
5(11+2a)=5 \cdot 11 + 5 \cdot 2a = 55 + 10a
$$

$$
4-2(2x-4) = 4-(2 \cdot 2x - 2 \cdot 4) = 4-(4x-8) = 4-4x+80-4x+12
$$
